title: How To Build Scalable Real-Time Applications With JavaScript
author: Alexander T Williams
description: Tips on building scalable real-time applications with JavaScript, using WebSocket, server-sent events (SSE), and libraries like Socket.IO.
cntitle: 使用 JavaScript 构建可扩展的实时应用程序
cndescription: 使用 WebSocket、服务器发送事件 (SSE) 和 Socket.IO 等库，构建可扩展的实时 JavaScript 应用程序的技巧。
